title: border-to-vertices
description:
Draw borders as vertices in a metric file.

Outputs a metric with 1s on vertices that follow a border, and 0s elsewhere.  By default, a separate metric column is created for each border.

surface.title: surface
surface.description: the surface the borders are drawn on

opt_border_name.title: opt_border_name
opt_border_name.description: create ROI for only one border: the name of the border
